/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their leafless branches reaching towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly overhead, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the brown of the buildings. The image is a beautiful representation of the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
